Sentencas: Gadolinia doped ceria (GDC) powders with different gadolinium contents were successfully prepared by the thermal decomposition of ceria complexes.
Titulo: Electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells derived from metal complexes: Gadolinia-doped ceria

Sentencas: All the calcined powder samples were found to be ceria-based solid-solutions having a fluorite-type structure.
Titulo: Electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells derived from metal complexes: Gadolinia-doped ceria

Sentencas: The powders were cold-isostatically pressed and sintered in air at 1500 degrees C for 5 h to attain a sintered density of about 90% of its theoretical value.
Titulo: Electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells derived from metal complexes: Gadolinia-doped ceria

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the GDC pellets in air was studied as a function of temperature in the 225-700 degrees C range, by using two-probe electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements.
Titulo: Electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells derived from metal complexes: Gadolinia-doped ceria

Sentencas: The highest total conductivity (sigma(600 degrees C) = 0.025 S/cm) was found for the Ce0.85Gd0.15O1.925 composition.
Titulo: Electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells derived from metal complexes: Gadolinia-doped ceria
